text:
Funny that Doopliss hasn't ever been in another game...
Or has he?
author: The13th Rose

text: Welcome back yay!!!!
author: Leonhart

text: I haven't played this game, so I don't know the context for this theme, but parts of it are really reminiscent of Smithy's theme from Super Mario RPG.
author: James Stark

text: One of the best tracks from the game!
author: Doughboy123x

text:
One of the most memorable bosses/chapters in the game, for me at least...This and Glitzville.
...But pretty much damn near EVERY moment in this game was just magical. Like, 13 years and this Thousand Year Door is still a masterpiece in my opinion.
author: The Real Sean W. Stewart

text: TYD might be one of my all time favorite RPGs ever. It sits with FF 6, LISA:The painful and the Golden Sun games at the top of the list.
author: Kebab

text: This game is BEGGING for a Switch remaster... maybe that fixes all the backtracking in this chapter? One can only hope...
author: DawnofMeat

text: If I were doing this list, this would have been the first song I would have added lol
author: Yareyous

text: Aw man, one of my favorite moments from one of my favorite games. Running back and forth to creepy steeple was a bit of a pain but this whole chapter was so cool and Vivian was always my favorite partner. Great theme, too. Wacky and a little creepy, just the right mix.
author: relativeevil

text: Pressing the A button after the battle itself and realizing what actually happened is still one of my favorite gaming moments ever.
author: Lucas

text: Best fake out in video games. This part blew my mind as a kid.
author: Waaku Faaku

text: This part blew my mind as an adult!
author: Jonochrome

text: Wow Dooplis's theme wasn't in the Best VGMs until now? I'm surprised

text: Doopliss? This is Mario's theme, man.

text: Scott Flake i see what you did there.

text:
Man, it's been a while. 
It's always nice to see a video uploaded by you in my sub box.

text: Spooky fight with a weird named foe!

text: What a strangely bizarre song to listen to while doing work. Hmm
author: Azure Alufei

text: Lol. I had this song on like an hour loop for studying for Finals last semester. Best/worst decision ever (it's surprisingly conducive to working, but after a certain number of loops you start questioning your life choices).

text: First! MWUAHA

text: I-I feel so hypocritical...  I don't even care about this. Whether I Got it or not, like..  what have I done?
author: animefanatic777

text: You've done the worst thing possible ever on a YouTube video: Commented with the only word as "first"
author: rickywolfy101

text: Sorry everyone but I'm back, you will have to put up with some VGM once again. I had a great, relaxing and sunny vacation filled with great food and visits. Spain is a beautiful country! I feel recharged now and ready for my favorite season. Starting things up with some Paper Mario TTYD, which is still easily one of my favorite games of all time.
author: SupraDarky

text: We didn't miss you!! Back already? ;D
author: Philip J. Fry II

text:
I am also going to S ain this summer. That will be nice.

 aper Mario tTYD is indeed one of the best games of all time. A true master iece jrpg if you ask me. The story, the characters, the gameplay, the atmosphere: it is all very good!

Also, sometimes it is hard to me to write words like "Doo liss" since my letter "p" is missing form my keyboard.
author: Eirian Odalis
